website_summaries.verdict: The LG G6 is still a decent phone if you can find it cheap.
pros: The beautifully design LG G6 is water resistant with a tall, expansive display and an extra wide-angle camera
cons: The phone is LG's first flagship in years without a removable battery
It has last year's Snapdragon 821 chipset

customer_reviews.title: great phone, bought it last january
customer_reviews.text: great phone, bought it last April. However, moisture sensor in charging port is SUPER SENSITIVE after a couple of months of use and it won't let me charge again. And since there is no USA warranty, I can't get it fixed. If you tried taking it apart to fix it yourself, you can't because there is no way to get inside. Now, it won't even turn on. super disappointed because of one small problem
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: or at least that is what it looks like from the charger
customer_reviews.text: i got the korean version, or at least that is what it looks like from the charger, got headphones although are not the "high end" LG was suppose to be giving, box was sealed so i dont know and dont care. the camera is somewhat underwhelming my previous g4 took better low light pictures without that much noise. and being the high bit rate audio one i didnt get wireless charging witch is a shame cuz i wanted that one for the office desk. still for the price i believe i couldn't have goten a better phone. cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Dubois

customer_reviews.title: The website description is incorrect. It is not "H870DS", It is "H870"!!
customer_reviews.text: This website description is incorrect. I'd ordered LG G6 "H870DS", but I'd received "H870", two times. It is H870 32GB!!
customer_reviews.author: Seungjo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service provided by Karen. Contacted them before placing my order and she provided me with every info I needed. Phone arrived without any scratches looked very new! Very pleased with my order PS: I thought it was not going to be authentic looking @ the price this phone is sold @ but it turned out to be what I was hoping for : ) Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Arida

customer_reviews.title: Great price .. excellent phone so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom..Not sure about water resistance but other than that she loves the phone. Very fast.. easy to hear her on phone..lots of features that she loves. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: January Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Careful ol
customer_reviews.text: Careful-- I ordered an unlocked phone and got one locked that I could not unlock its a T-Mobile phone and i needed att - phone great too bad I could not use -- just requested refund
customer_reviews.author: alex weber

customer_reviews.title: Good pre-owned phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent phone. I recommend it to anyone looking for a less expensive preowned mobile. It's got lots of room to grow if you want give it a nice sized SD card. The only down size is battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Nenal

customer_reviews.title: worst ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I got this phone. I have been without one for a while because mine broke, when I got the phone and it was T mobile and I needed to put in a verizon sim card I knew I was going to have some trouble, but when I took it to get unlocked, I was told that the phone was attached to an account that had money due still.....which means someone thought they could get out of paying their bill....guess what...It doesnt work that way...
customer_reviews.author: Terianne

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAUTIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to use for my AT&T service. It says in the description that it will work with that carrier. WRONG. It states will not work with Verizon. When I received the phone it was from Verizon. I put my sim card in and of course it didn't work. My wife has Verizon so we put her sim card in. It worked perfectly. The phone was not unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harris

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I am VERY VERY happy with my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I really was hoping there would be no issue, but I have to be honest, this phone really exceeded my expectations. I thought Id probably have to reprogram the phone or have scratches or some button or other malfunctioning, I have to say I am VERY VERY happy with my new phone. Sounds like an ad, but thats because if some jerk steals my phone again, I will probably buy from these guys again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: No envían el modelo que promocionan, cámara no enfoca
customer_reviews.text: I bought an LG G6 H870 international version and they send me an LG H872 T-Mobile that version of smartphones does not work for me, I brought it to El Salvador and it does not work here, camera does not focus, bad purchase
customer_reviews.author: William Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, nice size. Had to adapt the unlocked GSM phone to be compatible with ATT contacts. Codes given to me over the phone by ATT. But worked great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Purpletoo

customer_reviews.title: O7 deal.
customer_reviews.text: People already know about the phone as it is now new now. It was pleasure business with you guys. As described phone was T-Mobile and I got it unclocked easily as mentioned in the instructions paper.
customer_reviews.author: Anand

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone only things I dont really care for are the fact that it doesn't have an led light indicator when you have a notification and it doesnt have a menu button you have to keep all your apps on the main screen. Only flaws of this phone other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Silver LaFave

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great performing phone. Voice speaker seemed to have a little issue. sometimes. Yes, I did go under water with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn s Wright

customer_reviews.title: This phone is pretty solid. Already knew what I was buying
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty solid. Already knew what I was buying, but this guys sell a good product; everything works and the thing I thought that would be a problem for me like the T-Mobile branding is non-existence except for apps that you can disable. Very good phone for the price (IP 68 water resistant is legit)
customer_reviews.author: Sam L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone with a slew of features! Dropped it in the tub and it just warned me that it detected moisture in the usb port and advised me not to charge it..
customer_reviews.author: Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Not a sigle scratch on the screen, after about 7 moth I'm very happy with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brailer Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Dies quick...at least doesnt break when dropped.... I have gotten a different phone after I bought this sadly
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Coite

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 🔋 life is not the best but it's a good phone
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Get the US one
customer_reviews.text: Wifi wont turn on. Its a hardware problem not software. Cameras glass breaks in your pocket its so weak. 4g drops if a call comes in. Really disappointed. Should have gone with the usa version
customer_reviews.author: WookieeEatsEwok

customer_reviews.title: preloaded tones and themes really suck..
customer_reviews.text: On the technical side, it is a very capable phone, but a bit of a chunky monkey. On the trivial side, preloaded tones and themes really suck...otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First purchase like this but seems great for what we need!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Maccioli

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this phones performance. I will not be buying products from this store again.

customer_reviews.title: Phone stop working
customer_reviews.text: MY husband bought this phone we alone have it for 3 months and now the phone just stop working it doesn't come on or anything ... Being trying to contact seller and nothing. The phone didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Renny

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I had always had samsung phones in the past. I was skeptical about buying a different phone. I was pleasantly surprised of how easy it was to switch. I love the camera on this phone. For the money I couldn't have asked fora better phone.

customer_reviews.title: Having lot of issues
customer_reviews.text: Phone is heating up and during phone or internet calls, when you turn on speaker, other person wont hear anything. I dont recommend

customer_reviews.title: A bit dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone last July and it was working pretty good at first but then the fingerprint scanner started to act up until it just completely stop working. With no fingerprint I have to unlock it the regular way which is a pain but otherwise its a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: Mobile is locked work only with t-mobile I tray to unlocked with t- mobile they told me tray with the seller the seller told me tray with t-mobile .

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone ...... I actually bought it because of the water resistance

customer_reviews.title: Love my LG G6 phone.
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied with the purchase. Thank you for your prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Phone was suppoused to be unlocked but its unable to connect to different service providers except tmobile. The rest is totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best phone you can get in my opinion, and I also get 4g in the US even though it's the Korean version.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the LG G6 Outterbox Defender Case...
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy I was to get the 4g established, also the Wi-Fi and Bluetooth onnectivity is awesome. Plus installing apps was a breeze!

customer_reviews.title: Cell is excellent but carrier not
customer_reviews.text: The Cell is excellent, but the carrier (LaserShip) left the package on front of the door on the floor, which was unusual and left the package at risk of theft

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: The seller was misleading with the description of the phone

customer_reviews.title: sprint network phone not fully unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to use this phone. It can not with another network. It's locked to sprint network.

customer_reviews.title: Best choice ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was awsome it came almost brand new and the battery life is amazing

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It said it was a used unlocked phone. But came with T-Mobile bloatware. Other than that very good
customer_reviews.author: Johan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, its highly underrated. The phone is t-mobile branded but works with any carrier. (using mint SIM)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I ever wanted in a phone. I'll recommend it to all my friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, before i had bought it i was a little worried as to whether it would work when i activate it and thankfully it did, the phone came in brand new sealed and in perfect condition, wrapped around little air bags unlike some other shipments that have come with the item on the side againts the walls and the rest is filled with air bags which just seems like the item might be damaged during shipping but anyways it eally was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Better than the G5
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this phone. All the bells and whistles of the G5 without some of the "ticks" The screen is flat again, did not like the curve. Does not seem to have the Heat issue the G5 has, never gets as hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ecboyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: misleading publication, appeared bands 4g (700) that in Argentina does not work. a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working perfect, its arrived in perfect condition. Great camera. Nice screen
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the cell phone is beautiful, I come from a galaxy note 4
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars just because I bought the 64gb version and they sent me the 32gb. The rest of the cell phone is beautiful, I come from a galaxy note 4. a good change. "Note 4 is an EXTREME cell phone to this day."
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Antolinez

customer_reviews.title: Not Completely Unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: Fully unlocked, Not! My phone came with T-Mobile software and a T-Mobile splash page and music. The instructions tell you how to completely unlock the phone to use with AT&T, BUT, the splash page and music is T-Mobile and you cannot get rid of it. When I found out that this problem existed, I decided to send it back. I never got to test the phone from a technical standpoint. It may be a great phone, but I am disappointed with T-Mobile issue. It is possible that I could have problems with AT&T because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in LA

customer_reviews.title: 8/10 phone. 11/10 for value and expectations
customer_reviews.text: Screen is sometimes unresponsive. Battery is great. Camera is amazing for width AND Depth. Charges FAST. Fairly snappy processor, but opening a few apps does noticeably slow responsiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product. My only issue with it is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. My only issue with it is that it came with a plug for England's walls but other than that the phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Could not be activated !!
customer_reviews.text: Not factory unlocked, not new either. As a matter of fact the IMEI was reported stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pina

customer_reviews.title: Normally factory unlocked phone are able to use in any ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally factory unlocked phone are able to use in any country. this is factory unlocked phone. so. I bought it in Amazon site.. but I can't use in country. amazon site does not informed about this phone are not used in my country,
customer_reviews.author: KWON SANG WOO

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Device Delivered
customer_reviews.text: Phone works fine, however I paid for the 64gb version and was shipped the 32gb version.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: The phone overall was fine, but did not work with my phone service. No mobile data was available when I switched to the new phone. Pretty pointless if the phone only works on wifi. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: The cellphone was supposed to have an internal memory of 32GB but it only came with 22. On top of this problem, now the cellphone says it is "humid" and it refuses to charge...I googled this problem and it seems the adaptor of this type of funds has a major issue and many users have had the same problem...Useless phone
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Like its cousins this phone is not instinctual. Manual is helpful but will require a lot of study. It is my intention to use it primarily as a phone and add apps and features later. Hope the phone lasts long enough for me to take full advantage. Great screen, great battery, great camera.
customer_reviews.author: mrbligh

customer_reviews.title: 90% Cooler than your phone
customer_reviews.text: Updated to Android 9 Pie, better camera app, and factory unlocked equals perfection even in 2020. FYI England/European model, so no wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: brian cox

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Verizon and seller is not getting back to me on the return I requested. Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome phone. Honestly i don't think you'll need much other than this.
customer_reviews.text: It took like 7 drops for mine to even crack, and it was water resistant until it got a large enough crack for water to seep through.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell

customer_reviews.title: the bad. The glass on glass can be slippery (obviously) ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the bad. The glass on glass can be slippery (obviously) and the camera, especially the wide angle camera and the front camera is no good in low light conditions. The good, The camera is amazing when there is adequate light with enough modes to rival most Point and shoots. The phone is easy to hold and feels premium and sturdy. The screen is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Travys

customer_reviews.title: Two ways charging. Waterproof, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Its worth the money. Very good sounds loud very loud speaker I love it. Fast and lighter Bad signal reception
customer_reviews.author: wvnate

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny :)
customer_reviews.text: LG G6 phone came as promised "new" I absolutely love it. Currently playing with it now. Very fast shipping! Will definitely buy from them again. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Dakkia

customer_reviews.title: Fast enough to use in 2018
customer_reviews.text: For 2017 model, I have no issue running heavy apps and games. I have used for a month and so far working without issues
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Battery life... is a super plus...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy LG G6. This phone has Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: The LG Ice Platinum Phone is a very nice phone. I didn't have problems setting it up with my carrier and it works like expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Phone, Great Refurbishing Practices
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't knowingly purchase a refurbished item, I wouldn't have known. This item arrived in the original LG packaging without any sort of cosmetic damage and was supplied with all accessories. Big props to BREED for offering a great unboxing experience with refurbished products. The phone itself is awesome, as expected, with fast performance, a beautiful screen, a great camera (wide angle is amazing and the main camera offers a ton of manual control), a premium feeling body, and an overall pleasant experience. If you have the cash, grab this phone as it can be picked up for cheaper than other flagships while performing just as well if not better in some regards.
customer_reviews.author: Jaykstah

customer_reviews.title: bdsj tech is a scam
customer_reviews.text: Within a hour of taking the phone out of the box and updating it bricked the phone making it completely useless. The seller bdsj tech is making me pay the return shipping
customer_reviews.author: timothy santoro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the item was very good phone and also the customer service thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Seller is very good. Phone is okay
customer_reviews.text: Seller is very good. Phone is okay. I eschew Apple products at all costs, so Android only for me. Liked the fact that this phone is updated frequently. The problem is the battery life. I use my phone a lot, and this one is dead by late afternoon. My other phone is a Huawai Mate 9. The battery in that phone lasts me two days. So, for me, this phone is not practical because I am not always near a power source.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Premium at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: This phone has everything that I have wished for in a smartphone. I have loved the LG designs going back to their Nexus 5 which I thought was perfect. The G6 takes up a notch with their superb premium quality and excellent design. What I like the most about the phone is its display because the colors are so vivid and clear. In my opinion, the screen is one of the best ones I have ever seen on any phone to date, and yes I have had iPhones, Samsungs, Pixel Phones, etc,etc. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite! Not jealous of the Galaxy S8 either!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! Not jealous of the Galaxy S8 either! I prefer the LG interface to Samsung, and the lack of a Bixby button and fingerprint sensor placement to me were the deciding factors. To each their own!
customer_reviews.author: Juwan I. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the 64 gig version sweat i was looking forward to wireless charging but oh well
customer_reviews.author: rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong color...did not work with my verizon sim card.... bad experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a H870 cell phone and i was given an H870DS
customer_reviews.author: mgon74

product_meta.title: LG G6 H870DS 32GB (FACTORY UNLOCKED) 5.7" QHD (BLACK) International Version - No USA Warranty
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Big Screen that Fits in Your Hand, Say hello to the LG G6. The LG G6 packs a 5.7" display in an attractive sleek phone that comfortably fits in one hand. Unlike other phones with a similar screen size, the large 5.7” display fits in your hand, giving you a big screen experience without the inconvenience of a big phone.
feature_bullets: 5.7-inch IPS LCD Capacitive Touchscreen, 1440 x 2880 pixel resolution (~565ppi pixel density)
Android v7.0 Nougat, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8996 Snapdragon 821, Processor: Quad-Core (Dual-Core 2.35 GHz Kryo & Dual-Core 1.6 GHz Kryo), GPU: Adreno 530

Dual 13 Megapixel Camera (f/1.8, OIS, 3-axis, phase detection AF) + 13MP (f/2.4, No AF), Dual-LED Flash, 1/3" sensor size, 1.12 µm pixel size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR + 5 Megapixel Front Camera with f/2.2, 1080p Full HD, Camera Resolution: 2560 x 1920 pixels
WLAN: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac + MIMO; Bluetooth: 4.2, A2DP, LE, aptX HD; GPS: Yes with A-GPS, GeoTagging, GLONASS, BeiDou; NFC: Yes; USB: v3.1 Type-C Reversible Connector

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars199 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
